dinosaurios.heroDescription: This site documents the paleontological campaigns of the APASUR & LACEV team, based at the Bernardino Rivadavia Museum (Buenos Aires). Since 2002, they have discovered over 40 new species and published 5 covers in Nature. Now they invite you to participate, vote, donate, and watch live excavations.

hero.title: Connect dog walkers and
hero.subtitle: App to coordinate walks and care. Owners can post requests or search walkers; walkers apply to jobs and manage their schedule.

overview.title: What is DogCo?
overview.body: DogCo is an app that matches pet owners with nearby walkers. It lets you post requests, receive applications, chat, schedule and track the walk.

cards.title: Smart match
cards.text: Search by radius, price and pet size.

cards.title: Request flow
cards.text: Owners post and walkers apply, or owners hire directly.

cards.title: Tracking
cards.text: Live walk log with notes, photos and check-ins.

owner.title: For owners
items: Create requests with time, duration and area preference
Compare applications, chat and book
Dashboard with upcoming bookings and spend
Pet profile with health, routines and documents

walker.title: For walkers
items: Verified profile, work radius and services
Nearby requests inbox and applications
Dashboard with upcoming jobs and live walk
History and simple metrics (earnings, rating)

dashboards.title: Dashboards
dashboards.owner: Owner panel: agenda, upcoming bookings and quick actions
dashboards.walker: Walker panel: filters, nearby requests and live walk

steps.title: Create account & role
steps.text: Choose Owner or Walker (you can switch later).

steps.title: Complete your profile
steps.text: Set availability, radius, services and verifications (phone / email).

steps.title: Post or apply
steps.text: Owners post a request. Walkers apply to nearby jobs or reply via chat.

steps.title: Live walk
steps.text: Start walk, mark events (water, pee, poop), upload photos and leave a note.

owner.title: Owner
items: Manage pets and preferences
Post requests and hire
Receive walk proof

walker.title: Walker
items: Set prices and radius
Manage schedule and jobs
Record walk evidence

hero.title: Learn about
hero.subtitle: Learning communities with curated content, live sessions, practical challenges, and mentoring. A system designed for continuous and actionable learning.

overview.title: What is Scalabl?
overview.body: Scalabl is a learning communities platform focused on business. It combines a public acquisition landing page (marketing, SEO, content) with a private member ecosystem: living curricula, resource library, session calendar, forums, challenges, and progress tracking.

community.title: Community
community.text: Topic spaces, forums, networking, and guided mentoring.

content.title: Curated content
content.text: Short lessons, playbooks, and ready-to-use templates.

practice.title: Practice & feedback
practice.text: Challenges, live reviews, and learning evidence.

landing.title: Landing (public access)
items: SPA architecture with Vite + React (performance & DX).
Sections: Value hero, social proof, Communities, What they are, How they work, Pricing, and persistent CTA.
Technical SEO: metatags, OG/Twitter cards, sitemap, semantic structure.
Consistent UI: purple/green palette, rounded buttons, soft shadows, legible type.
Integrations: YouTube embed, WhatsApp CTA, and newsletter.

platform.title: Platform (members area)
items: Role-based auth (member, mentor, admin) with route guards.
Modules: Library, Calendar, Challenges/Deliverables, Forums/Comments, Progress.
Admin panel for curricula, posts, sessions, and reports.
Engagement analytics (retention, weekly activity, challenge completion).
Suggested architecture: React (FE) + Node/Express API or serverless + DB (PostgreSQL / Firestore).

role.title: My role & responsibilities
items: UI/UX design for the landing and reusable components.
Responsive implementation focused on performance (CLS, LCP, TTI).
Integration of video, forms, analytics, and conversion CTAs.
Definition of FE architecture, state, and protected routes.
Proposal of key modules for the community and member flows.

impact.title: Impact & results
impact.note: *Estimated metrics based on benchmarks and local tests. Adjustable to production data.

stack.title: Proposed stack
items: Vite + React
React Router
Context / Zustand
Node/Express API
PostgreSQL / Firestore
Role-based Auth
YouTube / WhatsApp
SEO + Analytics

valueImpact.title: Value and impact
valueImpact.p1: Sistask is the core operational platform for ticket management that Sistran will roll out across more than 17 LATAM countries, standardizing processes and elevating service quality at a regional scale.

points.text: unifies operations in one platform with full per-ticket history (who/when/what).
proactive alerts and real-time monitoring (status times, agent load, critical backlog).
regional dashboards, saved filters, and KPIs per country/business for faster decisions.
role-based workflows, templates, and reusable filters that reduce time and errors.
roles/permissions by country/team, audit logs, and compliance support.

valueImpact.outcome: Result: faster response times, higher SLA compliance, and end-to-end visibility for a consistent regional implementation.

ip_banner.text: ⚠️ For intellectual property reasons, the images are partially blurred.

overview.title: What is Sistask?
overview.body: Sistask is a platform to manage projects and incidents with focus on traceability, SLAs, and visibility. It allows creating tickets, prioritizing them, assigning by role, and following their lifecycle with history, attachments, and reports.

items.title: Dashboard
items.caption: Main panel with charts and widgets. View reports based on saved filters (status, priority, project, date, assignee, etc.), pin gadgets with key KPIs, apply quick filters, and save configurations.
items.alt: Dashboard with configurable charts and widgets in Sistask

items.title: Ticket Detail
items.caption: Complete ticket record. Includes history (who/when/what), workflow (role-based actions: reopen, resolve, close), attachments, time logs, SLA and current status, plus user assignment and permissions.
items.alt: Ticket detail with history, workflow, attachments and SLA in Sistask

workflow.title: Workflow
bullets: To Do → In Progress → In Review/QA → Done.
Optional states: Blocked, QA Testing, Ready for Release.
Each transition logs an event into the history (who/when/what).

boards.title: Boards
bullets: Scrum: backlog, sprints, estimations, and velocity.
Kanban: continuous flow, WIP limits, and visual control.
Advanced filters and saved searches (status, priority, project, assignee, dates).
boards.query:
project = HDS
AND status = "In Progress"
AND assignee = currentUser()

reports.title: Dashboards and Reports
bullets: Burndown chart: sprint progress.
Velocity chart: delivery capacity per sprint.
Pie chart: distribution by status/priority/user.
Cumulative Flow Diagram: flow and bottlenecks.

roles.title: Roles and Permissions
bullets: Admin: configures projects, workflows, fields, and users.
Project Lead: prioritizes backlog and manages releases.
Assignee/Agent: executes work on assigned tickets.
Reporter: creates the ticket and validates closure.

create.title: Create a Ticket
steps: Project: project the ticket belongs to.
Issue type: Epic, Story, Task, Bug, etc.
Description: details, steps, and expected result.
Save. The ticket starts in the initial workflow state and notifies the team.

sla.title: SLAs and Notifications
bullets: Target times by type/priority.
Alerts when a ticket approaches or exceeds SLA.
Notifications on status changes, comments, and reassignments.

best.title: Best Practices
bullets: Use clear and specific titles.
Describe steps to reproduce and expected result.
Attach evidence (screenshots, logs).
Keep statuses updated and close with requester validation.

formulario.title: Do you want to work with me?
formulario.paragraph: Fill out the form or contact me on social media. I'm ready to create something amazing together.

scalabl.descripcion: Global educational platform for innovation and entrepreneurship.

sistran.descripcion: Task and workflow management system for insurance consulting firms.

dinosaurios.descripcion: Scientific landing page for real-time paleontological campaigns in Patagonia, featuring livestreams, discoveries, voting, and donations.

dogco.descripcion: App that connects pet owners with walkers: requests, applications and live walk tracking.

portfolio_description: I am a Front-end Developer with over three years of professional experience building modern, scalable, and user-focused web solutions. Specialized in React, with strong expertise in UI/UX design, REST APIs, state management, and responsive design. Currently integrating TypeScript to enhance code quality, scalability, and maintainability. I am proactive, collaborative, and passionate about turning ideas into functional, visually appealing, and high-performance digital products.

experience_section.sistran_stack: Stack: React, Axios, Bootstrap, MUI, ReactFlow, Cytoscape, React Beautiful DnD
experience_section.sistran_desc: Lead frontend developer for Sistask, an internal Jira-style tool used by more than 150 real users in development, QA, support, and management teams in Argentina, Colombia, and Ecuador.
sistran_bullets: Led the frontend from scratch alongside the backend team.
Dynamic interface for configuration by project and issue type.
Conditional logic according to workflow states.
Workflow visualization with ReactFlow and Cytoscape.
Permission system by role and project.
Key work for the system’s success and regional scalability.
experience_section.scalabl_desc: Global educational platform present in more than 50 countries.
scalabl_bullets: Interfaces in React, jQuery, and Python.
Worked with the UX/UI team for accessibility and smooth navigation.
Frontend integration with a Python backend.
Refactoring to improve performance and maintainability.
Direct impact on thousands of users across the Americas, Europe, and Africa.

sistran.stack: React, Axios, Bootstrap, MUI, ReactFlow, Cytoscape, React Beautiful DnD

impacto.p1: Sistask is being implemented across 17 Latin American countries, marking a strategic leap in Sistran’s internal process digitalization. The system enables more efficient, standardized management for distributed teams in Argentina, Colombia, Ecuador, and the rest of the region.
impacto.p2: I am part of the team responsible for Sistask, leading the entire frontend from technical build to user experience (UX) and visual interface (UI). This work included:

bullets.diseno: Definition and development of a clean, scalable, accessible design.
bullets.xp: Intuitive experience for both technical and non-technical users.
bullets.componentes: Custom components built with React, MUI, and Bootstrap.
bullets.adaptabilidad: Adaptability by country, project, and user role.

metrics.productividad: Operational productivity: reduced task management time.
metrics.visibilidad: Visibility: real-time visual tracking of flows and statuses.
metrics.colaboracion: Collaboration: unified criteria and processes across countries.
metrics.escalabilidad: Scalability: ready to support multiple organizational structures.

impacto.cierre: Thanks to this team effort, Sistran now has a modern, robust, and adaptable tool that powers its regional expansion and strengthens internal efficiency.

scalablExp.proyecto: Global educational platform present in over 50 countries

responsabilidades.item1: Development of interactive interfaces for users in over 50 countries.
responsabilidades.item2: Efficient integration of frontend with a Python backend.
responsabilidades.item3: Collaboration with the UX/UI team on accessibility and navigation.
responsabilidades.item4: Refactoring modules to improve performance and maintainability.

impacto.descripcion: Scalabl is a global educational platform that promotes entrepreneurship and innovation. My work directly contributed to:
impacto.item2: Significant improvement in load speed and smoothness.
impacto.item3: Better experience for thousands of users across different continents.

mision_and_vision.title: My Vision
mision_and_vision.paragraph: I want to continue growing as a developer, participating in frontend and fullstack projects that challenge me technically and personally. I aim to create digital experiences that are functional, accessible, and visually appealing. My vision is to bring real value to each team, apply best practices, learn emerging technologies, and be part of environments that value quality, design, and collaborative work.

html.desc: Semantic, accessible markup with basic technical SEO.

css.desc: Responsive layouts, grid and flexbox, scalable styling.

javascript.desc: Frontend business logic, API consumption, and state handling.

react.desc: Dynamic dashboards with custom hooks and routing via React Router.

github.desc: Git flow, PRs, code reviews, and continuous integration.

python.desc: Lightweight backend integrations and support scripting.

typescript.desc: Static typing, domain models, and fewer build-time bugs.

php.desc: Backend development and API creation with PHP and related frameworks.
